# core package

The core MessageFormat-to-JavaScript compiler

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [MessageFormat](./core.messageformat.md) | The core MessageFormat-to-JavaScript compiler |

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [compileModule(messageformat, messages)](./core.compilemodule.md) | Compile a collection of messages into an ES module |

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [MessageFormatOptions](./core.messageformatoptions.md) | Options for the MessageFormat constructor |
|  [PluralFunction](./core.pluralfunction.md) | Function used to define the pluralisation for a locale |
|  [ResolvedMessageFormatOptions](./core.resolvedmessageformatoptions.md) | Returned by [MessageFormat.resolvedOptions()](./core.messageformat.resolvedoptions.md) |
|  [StringStructure](./core.stringstructure.md) | A hierarchical structure of ICU MessageFormat strings |

## Type Aliases

|  Type Alias | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [MessageFunction](./core.messagefunction.md) | A compiled message function, which may accept an object parameter |
|  [MessageModule](./core.messagemodule.md) | The type of the generated ES module, once executed |
